article_title: Sam Youngman: Matt Bevin starts race for governor in limbo between campaigns past, present
article_text: Matt Bevin wasn't ready this week to talk about the specifics of his campaign for governor. He also cut off questions about his losing primary challenge to U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell.

article_metadata.news-keywords: matt, bevin, republican, governor, kentucky, heiner, comer, scott

article_summary:
Matt Bevin wasn't ready this week to talk about the specifics of his campaign for governor.
He also cut off questions about his losing primary challenge to U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell.
